name: Spicy Bean Avocado Toast (Molletes)
description: This recipe for spicy bean avocado toast (molletes) was one of my favorite dishes as a child, of course not the vegan version I'm sharing with you now, but the ones slathered in cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut bolillos in half and place them on a sheet tray.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut bolillos in half and place them on a sheet tray.

recipeInstructions.text: Toast in oven, face up, for 3 to 4 min or until golden brown on top.,
recipeInstructions.name: Toast in oven, face up, for 3 to 4 min or until golden brown on top.,

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from oven and spread warm beans on each half.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from oven and spread warm beans on each half.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with avocado and homemade salsa.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with avocado and homemade salsa.

keywords: avocado toast, spicy bean avocado toast, vegan molletes
